login.accessRestriction: Access is restricted to LDAP accounts belonging to the university community of UPV/EHU.
login.title: Login SiREn0
login.subtitle: Online Survey Collection System
popup.title: Log in as
popup.encuesta.head: There are unanswered questions.
popup.encuesta.body: Click the 'Accept' button if you still want to send the survey.
popup.canclear.head: Are you sure you want to exit?
popup.enviada.head: Survey Sent
popup.enviada.body: The responses have been successfully sent
popup.errorEnvio.head: Sending Error
popup.errorEnvio.body: There was an error in sending the survey. Please try again later.
navbar.doc.head: SiREnO Main Menu
tiempo.restante2: Remaining time to activate the survey
no.encuestas: You don't have any surveys available at the moment.
no.campanas: You don't have any ongoing campaigns at the moment.
tiempo.restante3: Time remaining until the survey closes
popup.activacion.head: Survey Activation
popup.activacion.body: Choose the survey closure date and time.
popup.activacionERR.head: Activation Error
popup.activacionERR.body: The selected date must be between the current date and the expiration date of the campaign.
popup.activacionOK.head: Survey Activated
popup.activacionOK.body: The survey has been successfully activated until the specified deadline.
popup.activacionERR2.head: Activation Error
popup.activacionERR2.body: An unexpected error has occurred in the activation of the campaign.
popup.cerrada.head: Closed survey
popup.cerrada.body: The survey can be answered when the teacher or the administration open it.
popup.activacionERR3.head: Error on closing
popup.activacionERR3.body: An unexpected error occurred during the campaign closure.
popup.cerrar.head: Close survey
popup.cerrar.body: Are you sure you want to close the survey?
popup.cerradaOK.head: Survey closed
popup.cerradaOK.body: The survey has been successfully closed.
popup.inactiva.head: Survey closed
popup.inactiva.body: We're sorry. The deadline to respond to the survey has already passed.
informes.pers.head: Student opinion survey on the teaching of their teachers
promedio.obtenido: Average rating obtained for a question over time.
click.pregunta: (*) Clicking on a question shows its average rating over time.
